Articles.Content:
Hello very recently got this game on steam , love it ...my question 

Can I have a step by step guide for mod installation I need to know what version of KSP I have and some good simple suggestions for good mods.

for example I would like the B9 aero space pack. 

I am not a total beginner to modding I have already mad a back up of my game data folder, and keeping that safely, how ever I don,t know if I can just start adding these mods with out patches and plug ins. 

Some advice to get the B-9 aero space mod and perhaps the world war k mods would be fantastic

regards

Welcome to the forums!

I suggest you use CKAN. It's a great tool for just this sort of thing, and should make installing addons quite easy. [Here's the link to the thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100067-The-Comprehensive-Kerbal-Archive-Network-%28CKAN%29-Package-Manager-v1-6-5-6-Mar-2015). Download the CKAN client and run it, point it at your KSP folder, and then find B9 Aerospace in the list of mods and click to install it. Should be pretty simple. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What's nice about CKAN is it won't overwrite any game files, so you don't have to worry about making a backup. Even so, KSP addons don't generally require making backups anyway, since even mods that replace stock elements do so via new files.
Ok i will give this a try shortly and respond in due course thanks
